interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The GiggleBellies Musical Adventures Volume #1
Review Date: 2015/02/13
Store: Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['Meet the lovable GiggleBellies! A fresh and modern twist to preschool DVD\'s and music is finally here. Watch "The GiggleBellies" giggle and wiggle right into your little one\'s hearts. The Engaging multi-award winning DVD series combines colorful whimsical worlds, endearing characters, and fun upbeat music that even parents can enjoy! This fully animated music video DVD will keep your toes tapping and everyone can join the fun by singing and dancing along. Winner of multiple awards and accolades including “2010 DVD OF THE YEAR AWARD by Creative Child Magazine” and “Dr. Toy\'s Best Picks 2013”. Approximately 28 minutes with 9 animated music videos including:   The GiggleBelly Train  Old MacDonald Had A Farm  Wheels On The Bus  Peanut  ABC Superstar  Web Footed Friends  Jumping Monkeys  Kooky Bird  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star -adapted version with male singer.   You will need a computer with a DVD drive to access Downloadable & Printable items:  MP3’s of all 9 songs to download and create your own music CD  10 coloring pages  9 Fully illustrated lyric sheets  2 Fun & fantastic wallpapers  DVD runs Approx. 28 min, Region 0, Format NTSC.  DVD’s are designed to be viewed on anything that can play a DVD. If you expect to view our products across multiple media platforms, such as mobile devices, Apple TV, etc., please look for digital options via our online store. Not familiar with The GiggleBellies? Preview before you purchase! Subscribe to “The GiggleBellies” YouTube Channel and watch lower-res preview clips with your child to see if they enjoy it.']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.4 x 0.6 inches; 1 Pounds', 'Director': '3D Magic Factory', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '28 minutes', 'Producers': '3D Magic Factory', 'Studio': '3D Magic Factory', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: My kids love this sing along.

Timmy Time: Hide & Seek
Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Universal Studios Home Entertainment, All Universal Studios Titles
['Come out, come out wherever you are to join Timmy and his preschool playmates for hide and seek and so much more! From finding the perfect hiding place for noisy Paxton to making paper boats with a sneezy Stripey, Timmy and his friends uncover adventure and surprises filled with fun and laughter in these five adorable stories that the whole family will enjoy. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference**: Enjoys engaging and entertaining children's programming, with a strong focus on family-friendly content that resonates with young audiences. Recently demonstrated a penchant for musical and interactive media.
- **Family-Oriented**: Values shared viewing experiences with their child, seeking media that is enjoyable for all family members and encourages participation.
- **Language Accessibility**: Prefers content available in English and appreciates the presence of subtitles to enhance understanding and accessibility.
- **High Standards**: Maintains a discerning taste, evidenced by a consistent average rating of 4.7 and recently awarded a perfect score to a new title, underscoring their commitment to high-quality children’s media.
- **Creators and Studios**: Shows a clear preference for reputable directors and production studios known for quality children's content, emphasizing trust in their output and dedication to high production values.
- **Recent Interaction**: Recently purchased and positively reviewed a popular children’s title, reflecting an ongoing pursuit for captivating content that encourages active engagement, such as singing and dancing, reinforcing their enthusiasm for quality family-oriented programming suitable for young audiences. 

This updated profile illustrates the user's persistent commitment to quality, interactive, and family-friendly media experiences.
